title: How much will Ryan Braun's suspension cost the Brewers?
contentencoded: The Milwaukee Brewers are losing their star outfielder Ryan Braun for the rest of the season. He's agreed to a suspension without pay for unspecified violations of baseball's drug program and his contract. Andrew Zimbalist, a sports economist at Smith College, joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, July 23, 2013
teaser: The Milwaukee Brewers are losing their star outfielder Ryan Braun for the rest of the season. He's agreed to a suspension without pay for unspecified violations"of baseball's drug program and his contract.
